nodes.text: By 0 BBY, the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry fought a series of battles at the Outer Rim planet Mygeeto. The Alliance's Riot Squadron also fought there, during which the squadron earned its name.

In 3 ABY, the 61st soldiers Roja and Beak reminisced of the fighting at Mygeeto in the presence of First Sergeant, who had joined the company after Mygeeto, while on the ice planet Hoth. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, members of Riot Squadron recounted the fighting at Mygeeto during their time on the planet Jiruus.
The battle of Mygeeto was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
